extendedInfo.description: Note: For 1.2 version, pls uninstall previous version and reinstall again!!Support English(US),English(UK),Arabic,Croatian,Czech,Danish,Dutch,Finnish,French(Canada),French(Switzerland),German,German QWERTY,Hebrew, Hungarian-Italian,Norwegian Bokmal,Polish,Portuguese,Russian,Serbian,Spanish,Swedish,TurkishiKeyboard EX is an iPhone iOS 6 UI keyboard and input method. Very cool UI like iOS 6 and easy to use. You can type faster and easier with an iPhone keyboard layout,particularly helpful for people who are used to an iPhone keyboard. You can get the Exciting iPhone user experience and android capability in Android Phone!Major Feature:- Support iPhone iOS 6 UI Style and layout- Support same look and touch feeling with iPhone- Support switch between upper case and lower case- Support a variety of symbols - Support landscape and portrait input - Support number and browser input mode- Support auto capitalization- Support vibrate on keypress- Support sound on keypress- Support popup on keypress- Support google voice input (need google voice input plugin)- Many other featuresTag: iPhone Style, iOS, Keyboard, InputmethodEnjoy it!If you meet any issue, pls don't just rate one star. We hope your email the issue to hidevstudio(at)gmail.com, we will definitely feedback and resolve your issue asap.Or follow usFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/HiDevStudioTwitter:https://twitter.com/hidevstudioThis app is ad-supported. Search for 'iKeyboard EX Pro' for ad-free version.Note: Currently only support Android4.0 and above version!You can get more iPhone Style and Android capability Apps in "Hi Dev Studio".Thanks!

reviews.title: Almost perfect app. I would like to add some iphone keyboard sound
reviews.author: Francek Bosakk

reviews.title: Goed maar...
reviews.comment: Bij een echte iPhone zijn de letters allemaal hoofdletters en word de shift blauw bij indrukken. Als dat er was 5 sterren.
reviews.author: Kian van Holst

reviews.title: Auto correct
reviews.comment: If it would have auto correct I would have given 5 star  Other all is perfect
reviews.author: Hanish Yelchuri

reviews.title: needs volume toggle
reviews.comment: great keyboard app!  please add an option to adjust the volume of sound on keypress!! thanks!  deducted 1 star.. when the keyboard is on lower case the popup of letter y is v..
reviews.author: Cj Cuevas

reviews.title: Pity
reviews.comment: Was good. Won\'t update now error 24.... crashes now too
reviews.author: jason gilbert

reviews.title: Let letters capital stay always like iPhone
reviews.comment: Give option to lock Caps button when needed and let letters button stay caps always like iPhone.. fix it, will give good rating until only 2
reviews.author: Kanmani Subbu

reviews.title: Smooth!!
reviews.comment: I firstly use it and I know how exactly it\'s running. But I can\'t type in my language, pls add Thai language in a keyboard setting. Thank!!!

reviews.title: Great app until...
reviews.comment: ...the auto correct didnt work.  This app looks and feels the closest to an iphone keyboard but the only downfall I can find is the auto correct doesnt seem to work. I changed the settings to very aggressive but it didnt change a thing. It suggest the word that it thinks you mean at the top of the app but when I hit the spacebar it doesnt change a thing and leaves the mistake. Swiftkey fixes these mistakes and ill be switching back after writing thid review. Will give 5 star s if fixed
reviews.author: Trent Mayo

reviews.title: Please ios7 style
reviews.comment: ios7 style keyboard, please change the theme layout, to be perfect
reviews.author: Junior Valecillos

reviews.title: I Love this Keyboard but...
reviews.comment: I really love this keyboard ... it works fine on my sony xperia J ... and the thing is, I do have a galaxy y, but it doesn\'t support this keyboard... please make my galaxy y support this keyboard ... when it\'s already supported, I\'ll give u a 5 star ... above all that, this keyboard is awesome!
reviews.author: Norana Hassan

reviews.title: Where\'s the emoji
reviews.comment: This is way too perfect,if only you\'ll add up emojis please please please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: loving this keyboard
reviews.comment: this is the keyboard im looking for,,, totally the same from iphone and unlike from other keyboard the keys have real spacing to each other to avoid to accidentally the other one,,  must have keyboard

reviews.title: Very good app!
reviews.comment: ,but can you please add switch language button to switch between the input languages thank you .

reviews.title: Best iphone keyboard emulator ever
reviews.comment: This is great ,But I would like to have one request and that is to set keyboard vibration intensity ve tried different keyboard emulators such A.I keyboard and this just blows them out of the water

reviews.comment: Can you add the option to make the key board stay capital just like the iphone.

reviews.title: Great, but..........
reviews.comment: Every time I set it as default keyboard it doesnt show up, when I launch the settings it stays open for few seconds and then it closes without any warning( force close and others).Am I the only one who has this problem?

reviews.comment: I need emoji ini this keyboard. And the emoji can be use in every applications. Thankyou
